categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Preeda the Butcher was a female Sith living during or after the Cold War.

Preeda the Butcher was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic with Knights of the Eternal Throne expansion as a World Boss for Dark vs. Light system. Whenever the dark side of the Force reaches victory state on a server, Preeda the Butcher has a chance to spawn at one or more of selected locations on Coruscant and Dromund Kaas alongside other Dark Side World Bosses. Though killing her is required for an in-game achievement, it is impossible to determine when and where her death took place.
